channel.title: Food wont work
channel.description:
hey guys, in my server that is a 317 (pk planet source), my food wont work. For example, I eat sharks and it heals 0. I made a test account,( I used a master command and got 99hp) and i got my hp to 1. I ate a shark and it gives my hp to 10. This is really weird. Can sumone help me?
Also, my staff players are messed up to. When they do a teleport command like ::shops, they get lagged and logout.
One more problem, when someone loggs in, they get damaged any high amount that usually kills the player. rep+ if help :)

item.title: Food wont work
item.dc:creator: @x_vain_x x vain x
item.description:
@x_vain_x wrote:

Here’s the fixed version of half of I Vain I’s and my, food snippets.

	case 315:
            if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
            return;
            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
            if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);}
            c.sM("You eat the shrimps.");   
            if(c.currentHealth < 99) {
            c.currentHealth += 5;
            c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016);
            }
            if(c.currentHealth > 99) {
            c.currentHealth = 99;
            }
            c.deleteItem(315, slot, 1);
	break;

item.title: Food wont work
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555

item.title: Food wont work
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

Are you on in edgevillepvp source? This is how I fixed mine:

			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
			return;
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
			if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);}
			//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
			c.sM("You eat shark.");	
			if(c.currentHealth < 99) {
			c.currentHealth += 20;
			c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016);
			}
			if(c.currentHealth > 99) {
			c.currentHealth = 99;
			}
			c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1);
			break;

Hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Food wont work
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

it doesn’t disconnect me when i do ::teleto (coordx) (coordy)
but I want it to work by the command, cuz this is the problem:

mods get dced when they do ::shops
admins get dced when they do ::shops
owners get dced when they do ::shops
normal players don’t get dced when they do ::shops

Read full topic

item.title: Food wont work
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

ok forget that, but just tell me why my teleport commands wont work, heres an example:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops")) { toX = 3182; toY = 3440; sM("Shops - Remember To Bring Ca$h!"); }

and yet, I disconnect when I do ::shops

Read full topic

item.title: Food wont work

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

i already have everything you posted for the shark:

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) .currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

oh and where can i find my login method? sorry, i dont know this method stuff
